catalyst: The photocatalyst used in the experiment was g-C 3 N 4 -0.1/Bi 2 WO 6.
light source: A 300 W xenonarc lamp (Aulight CEL-HX, Beijing) with a 420 nm cutoff lter was used as a light source.
reactor type: The reactor type is not explicitly stated, but it is described as a batch reactor with a volume of 500 mL made of borosilicate glass with an optical quartz window.
